Html:
First of all - thanks for the great free library. The demo app works great and the charts look amazing.

I am trying to start from scratch using https://modernuicharts.codeplex.com/documentation#howto1 but I can't get this one to work/show. Everything builds, runs, but no charts are shown. Am I missing something? The only thing I changed was the name of the view model (MainViewModel instead of TestPageViewModel)

I did the binding to datacontext using:

this.DataContext = new MainViewModel();

in the page constructor.

Thanks!

Hi, the modern ui charts look really great. Thanks! But I couldn't get the example chart to work too. I'm not sure what's going wrong, but there aren't any binding errors or so. The pie chart simply doesn't appear.

I would really appreciate a minimal working example :)
yup same problem here. i can see the chart title and subtitle but no chart and annoyingly no errors either??
